text: O vy shcho vvazhayete, vy budete viryty v BOHU ta Yoho kur'yeru, ta svyate pysannya Vin vidkryv cherez Yoho kur'yera, ta svyate pysannya Vin vidkryv pered shcho. Budʹ khto khto vidmovlyayetʹsya viryty v BOHU, ta Yoho anhely, ta Yoho svyati pysannya, ta Yoho kur'yery, ta ostanniy Denʹ, diysno zbyvsya z shlyakhu daleko astray
